availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Fernando F. Shaw (Ripley, OH Justice of the Peace and Notary Public)

body.p: Residence: Ripley, Brown County, Ohio. An Ohio-born Justice of the Peace and Notary Public. Married Sarah. Father of Kate and Clara Shaw.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, Entry for Fernando F. Shaw (1829-1905), Find A Grave Memorial # 25945821, Maplewood Cemetery, Ripley, Brown County, Ohio, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=shaw&GSfn=fernando&GSbyrel=all&GSdyrel=all&GSob=n&GRid=25945821&df=all& (accessed 30 June 2017).
